subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Oakland traded the utility infielder Marco Scutaro to Toronto for the minor league right-handers Kristian Bell and Graham Godfrey. The A’s, who missed the playoffs, want to give Donnie Murphy a chance in Scutaro’s role.
snippet: Oakland traded the utility infielder Marco Scutaro to Toronto for the minor league right-handers Kristian Bell and Graham Godfrey. The A’s, who missed the playoffs, want to give Donnie Murphy a chance in Scutaro’s role.
